entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -17.9°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -20.6°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
